name: Hot-air Penguin Pair
description: Hot-air Penguin Pair (HPP) is a 3rd person side-scrolling adventure experience for Android mobile devices. The protagonist is Blue, a penguin who lives in the Antarctic region, who is taken on an adventure by Red on a hot-air balloon after Red realizes how stressed Blue has been feeling lately. Follow Blue and Red as they traverse through various locations like the Desert Wasteland and Verdant Valleys in a quest to reach Penguin Paradise and be finally relaxed! Will Blue and Red make it to their destination or will the stress of the journey finally get to them? Join them on the adventure and find out!
